img.title: Home
img.rs-layer: Where the Arts are Always a Priority

img.title: Home
img.rs-layer: Concord means peace, harmony. Peace in the world begins with concord in my world, and that can only happen as I am honest, unselfish, generous, kind, forgiving, considerate, and respectful.

article.class: post-4 page type-page status-publish hentry no-post-thumbnail

i.style: text-align: center; color: hsl(0, 2%, 42%); background-color: hsla(0, 2%, 47%, 0); color: #635a5a;font-size: 28px;

div.p: Concord Academy Boyne is a public charter school. There is NO tuition!
With an 11:1 student/teacher ratio, your child will receive the attention he or she needs to succeed.
We believe that integrating the arts—Band, Choir, Art, and Theatre—into our academic courses helps students learn and achieve more, while building confidence and self-esteem.
Our Creed forms the basis for everything we do. Character serves us in every setting in our lives, and as a small school, we strive to develop an awareness of character at every grade level.

div.blockquote: “Our charter school has a strong fine arts-based curriculum that allows students to get the many skills they will need for the real world.”Administrator Rebekah Leist

p.strong: Concord Academy Boyne has provided a quality education for students in Northern Michigan for over 20 years! Founded in 1995, we began with a vision, and that vision has only grown as we prepare students for a life of impact!

strong.span: Concord Academy Boyne is a small K-12 public charter school in Boyne City, Michigan, dedicated to a simple, yet profound educational principle. We believe the fine arts not only enrich the lives of our students, but the fine arts help fashion our students into well-rounded, dynamic, and confident young men and women who are creative thinkers.

Did you know that you can earn a scholarship towards college tuition at our charter authorizer, LSSU, by attending Concord Academy Boyne?
For more information about the LSSU “Junior Laker Award” scholarship,

h2.span:
Concord Academy Boyne is currently accepting new students.
Please contact us below for more information

div.a: Call us today to feel the difference

h2.span:
For immediate information such as school closings, please use the
Remind app by texting 81010 with the message @cabp

li.a: Last Day will be a Full Day!
Enrollment is our Key to Programs
6-8th Graders Are Going to Camp Daggett!
When One Goal is Met, Plan for Another!
Small Class Sizes are Boosting Enrollment!

div.p: Concord Academy Boyne, Created by Small Biz Web Marketing .com

div.div: Click here to receive the most up-to-date information at Concord Boyne.
